_header: From the bed to the floor
_description: Sin leads on to death — five English lines in a copy of the Summar predicantium

OxfOriel10.First Lines:
For þe bedde to þe floorAnd for þe putt to þe
                    peyneÞat neuer shal ende in certayn…
OxfOriel10.Last Lines:
…For al þe world to wyneÞay woolde not do a deedly
                    synne
OxfOriel10.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “A Death Lyric from the Summa predicantium, MS Oriel College 10.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 24 [222] (1977): 11-12: 12.
